mapper.select: SELECT tt.id,tt.groupName,concat(tt.count,'/',(SELECT value FROM config WHERE type='group_count' AND lable='count_type')) as count,td.configName,tc.name,tt.remarks,tt.imageUrl FROM group_relation tp INNER JOIN `group` tt ON tp.relationUserId=tt.userId LEFT JOIN config td ON tt.configId=td.id INNER JOIN user tc ON tp.relationUserId=tc.id WHERE relationUserId=#{userId}
